metadata.description: Specifies the location for all resources.
Specifies the environment of the deployment.
Specifies the prefix for all resources created in this deployment.
Specifies the tags that you want to apply to all resources.
Specifies the data engineering service that will be deployed (Data Factory, Synapse).

Specifies the list of resource IDs of Data Lake Gen2 Containers which will be connected as datastores in the Machine Learning workspace. If you do not want to connect any datastores, provide an empty list.

Specifies the resource ID of an Azure Kubernetes cluster to connect it with Machine Learning for model deployments. If you do not want to connect an AKS cluster to Machine Learning, leave this value empty as is.
Specifies the resource ID of a Conatiner Registry to which the Machine Learning MSI can be assigned. If you do not want to connect an external Container Registry, leave this value empty as is.
Specifies the object ID of the user who gets assigned to compute instance 001 in the Machine Learning Workspace. If you do not want to create a Compute Instance, leave this value empty as is.
Specifies the public ssh key for compute instance 001 in the Machine Learning Workspace. This parameter is optional and allows the user to connect via Visual Studio Code to the Compute Instance.
Specifies the administrator password of the sql servers in Synapse. If you selected dataFactory as processingService, leave this value empty as is.
Specifies the resource ID of the default storage account file system for Synapse. If you selected dataFactory as processingService, leave this value empty as is.
Specifies whether an Azure SQL Pool should be deployed inside your Synapse workspace as part of the template. If you selected dataFactory as processingService, leave this value as is.
Specifies the resource ID of the central purview instance to connect Purviw with Data Factory or Synapse. If you do not want to setup a connection to Purview, leave this value empty as is.
Specifies the resource ID of the managed storage of the central purview instance.
Specifies the resource ID of the managed event hub of the central purview instance.

Specifies the resource ID of the Databricks workspace that will be connected to the Machine Learning Workspace. If you do not want to connect Databricks to Machine Learning, leave this value empty as is.

Specifies the workspace URL of the Databricks workspace that will be connected to the Machine Learning Workspace. If you do not want to connect Databricks to Machine Learning, leave this value empty as is.

Specifies the access token of the Databricks workspace that will be connected to the Machine Learning Workspace. If you do not want to connect Databricks to Machine Learning, leave this value empty as is.
Specifies whether role assignments should be enabled for Synapse (Blob Storage Contributor to default storage account).
Specifies the cognitive service kind that will be deployed.
Specifies whether Azure Search should be deployed as part of the template.
Specifies whether monitoring capabilities should be enabled.
Specifies the email ID of the alerts receiver.
Specifies the resource ID of the subnet to which all services will connect.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for KeyVault.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Synapse Dev.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Synapse Sql.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Data Factory.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Data Factory Portal.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Cognitive Services.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Container Registry.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Azure Search.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Blob Storage.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for File Storage.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Machine Learning API.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Machine Learning Notebooks.

resources.scope: [format('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/{0}/blobServices/{1}/containers/{2}', split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[2])]
resources.name: [guid(uniqueString(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers', split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[2]), extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', variables('synapseSubscriptionId'), variables('synapseResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Synapse/workspaces', variables('synapseName'))))]

[format('{0}/{1}', parameters('machineLearningName'), format('{0}{1}', if(lessOrEquals(length(parameters('datalakeFileSystemIds')), 0), format('undefined{0}', copyIndex()), split(parameters('datalakeFileSystemIds')[copyIndex()], '/')[8]), if(lessOrEquals(length(parameters('datalakeFileSystemIds')), 0), format('undefined{0}', copyIndex()), last(split(parameters('datalakeFileSystemIds')[copyIndex()], '/')))))]

resources.scope: [format('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/{0}/blobServices/{1}/containers/{2}', split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[2])]
resources.name: [guid(uniqueString(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers', split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[2]), extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', variables('machineLearningSubscriptionId'), variables('machineLearningResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.MachineLearningServices/workspaces', variables('machineLearningName'))))]

chart.title: [format('Count Failed activity runs metrics for {0}', parameters('datafactoryName'))]
[format('Sum Succeeded pipeline runs metrics for {0}', parameters('datafactoryName'))]
